item.title: New Container: Mylar3
item.description: We have released a new container for Mylar3! Mylar3 is an automated Comic Book downloader (cbr/cbz) for use with NZB and torrents written in python. It supports SABnzbd, NZBGET, and many torrent clients in addition to DDL.
item.content:
We have released a new container for Mylar3!

Mylar3 is an automated Comic Book downloader (cbr/cbz) for use with NZB and torrents written in python. It supports SABnzbd, NZBGET, and many torrent clients in addition to DDL.
